themes: expanding funding sources beyond Hotel Occupancy Tax
providing alternative financial supports (utility discounts, tax incentives, loans)
inclusion of artists and arts organizations in broader opportunities
advocacy for private investment in the arts
key_phrases: Expand funding and other support opportunities (utility discounts/waivers, property tax incentives, working with CDFI for low interest loan terms, etc) beyond Hotel Occupancy Tax
Work with other departments to raise awareness about having artists and arts orgs at the table for opportunities
Leverage CoA leadership roles to advocate for private investments from local foundations and corporate benefactors
barriers_identified: limited funding sources tied to Hotel Occupancy Tax
lack of cross-departmental awareness or collaboration
limited inclusion of artists and arts organizations in non-arts-specific opportunities
solutions_proposed: Expand funding and support opportunities beyond Hotel Occupancy Tax
Provide utility discounts/waivers, property tax incentives, and low interest loan terms
Work with other departments to raise awareness and include artists and arts orgs in broader opportunities
Advocate for private investments from local foundations and corporate benefactors
